channel.title: Running error,
channel.description:
well, i'm just trying to run a server (not mine) and whenever i hit the run button, the windows command prompt comes up, but along with it a screen that says "windows cannot find 'javaw'. make sure you typed the name correctly, and then try again. and then once you click ok it goes away.
i'm running on windows vista btw, if it makes a difference.

item.title: Running error,
item.dc:creator: @troyson2 troyson2
item.description:
@troyson2 wrote:

i already tried that.

idk what’s wrong with it, it’s weird.
it works fine on windows xp, but the clients with vista don’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: Running error,
item.dc:creator: @djvawter djvawter
item.description:
@djvawter wrote:

im not sure how it would work on vista but right click the run file and click on edit. it should say something like:
@echo off
title…blah blah
javaw - xmx500…blah blah
i had this same problem but im on windows xp pro so it might be different but infront of the “javaw” type “start” so then it should look like this:
@ehco off
title…blah blah
start javaw xmx500…blah blah. hope this helped. if not tell me and i will help more
laterz

Read full topic
